mapper.select: SELECT c.COURSE_CODE AS COURSE_CODE, c.COURSE_NAME AS COURSE_NAME, c_s.COURSE_START_TIME AS COURSE_START_TIME, c_s.COURSE_END_TIME AS COURSE_END_TIME, c_s.COURSE_DAY AS COURSE_DAY, c_s.CLASSROOM AS CLASSROOM, p.PROFESSOR_NAME AS PROFESSOR_NAME FROM STUDENT_SCHEDULE s_s JOIN COURSE c on s_s.COURSE_CODE = c.COURSE_CODE JOIN COURSE_SCHEDULE c_s on s_s.COURSE_CODE = c_s.COURSE_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR p on c.PROFESSOR_CODE = p.PROFESSOR_CODE WHERE s_s.STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT_SCHEDULE (STUDENT_CODE, COURSE_CODE, SCHEDULE_YEAR, SCHEDULE_TERM) VALUES (#{studentCode}, #{courseCode}, '2024', '2')
